full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,(TSE RING MCHED LNGA'I GSOL MCHOD KYI CHO GA 'DOD 'JO'I BUM BZANG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, RGYU MTSAN 'GA' ZHIG LA BRTEN NAS, RANG NYID KYI MOS PA'I 'TSAMS SBYAR TE, RJE BTZUN GYI DNGOS SLOB NGAN RDZONG STON PA BHO DHI R'A DZA DANG, ZHVA DMAR BA DPAL CHOS KYI GRAGS PAS MDZAD PA'I GSOL KHA DANG, RJE BTZUN KUN DKA' SNYING POS SGRUBS THABS RIN 'BYUNG DU GSUNG BA'I CHO GA BSGRIGS RNAMS GZHIR BZHAG PA LA MTSANG BA KHA BSKANGS, GO RIM KHRIGS SU SDEBS, TSIG SBYOR 'GA' ZHIG GSAR DU BGYIS TE CHA TSAR LA 'KHYER BDE BAR, BTZUNG GZUGS ^DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GZHIS KA AO RGYAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, 'DI BRTZOM PA'I MGO TSUGS PA NA PHU MO GZHON NU MA LNGAS BZA' BTUNG STER BA DANG, MJUG RDZOGS SKABS GOS DAR DANG MU TIG 'BUL MKHAN BYUNG BA SOGS @009B MA BSGRIGS RANG 'GRIGS KYI RTEN 'BREL RMAD BYUNG BA 'GRIGS SO, ,BA GRA, ,BKRA SHIS,,, ,,)
